settings.title: ENJOY YOUR STAY
settings.content: Here for the people who love to be in and out of the water, just like us.

settings.title: Fairtrade
settings.content: We are proud to be fair-trade certified and only partner with factories that prioritize their workers.

settings.title: Our Fabric
settings.content: Our patent-pending Dri-Rite™ fabric technology is antimicrobial with moisture-wicking finish to speed up after-water dry time.

settings.title: Less Washing. More Splashing.
settings.content: Test backed by no wash-tests for months at the beach, pool and post-shower. The result = no smell.

settings.title: Our Packaging
settings.content: From our product bags to our shipping mailers. We use only recyclable materials.

settings.title: Welcome to Absorb Island
settings.content:
We are modernizing the toweling
industry by changing its very fabric. Our revolutionary Dri-Rite™ patent-pending fabric technology is the first dual-knit, antimicrobial terry with moisture-wicking finish to
speed up after-water dry time. Founded and run by women who love to vacation, Absorb Island is on a mission to change the way people dry after the pool, ocean, lake or gym.

settings.title: Meet Terry
settings.content:
Why a goat as our mascot? 
Very simple, we are the G.O.A.T, the greatest of all terry. Also, like goats, we are curious, highly intelligent and incredibly playful. Making him an integral part of the Absorb Island story.

settings.title: Absorb Island Vacations
settings.content: Our dual-knit terry with Dri-Rite technology is the first anti-odor, antimicrobial fabric with moisture-wicking finish to achieve optimal dry time. Quality and durability is at the forefront of our product.

settings.title: Fairtrade
settings.content: We are proud to be fair-trade certified and the woman-owned factories we work with are too.

settings.title: Our Fabric
settings.content: Grown without chemicals or pesticides, Absorb Island organic cotton is ethically and sustainably farmed.

settings.title: Less Washing More Splashing
settings.content: Absorb Island products require  less maintenance, making them  more environmentally friendly.  Our Dri-Rite ™ and Dri-Release  terry technology combines  ultra-absorbent, antimicrobial fiber  to promote longer product life  and less machine-washing.

settings.title: Our Packaging
settings.content: Absorb Island brand packaging is  100% recyclable, biodegradable, and  made from naturally sourced  virgin paper fiber.

settings.title: Our Impact
settings.content: From our fabric to our packaging, we choose sustainable solutions that promote a healthier planet.
